title: Silver Wattle
description: In fear for their lives after the sudden death of their mother, Adela and Klara must flee Prague to find refuge with their   uncle in Australia. There, Adela becomes a film director at a time when the local industry is starting to feel   the competition from Hollywood.But while success is imminent, the issues of family and an impossible love are never far away. And ultimately dreams of the silver screen must compete with the bonds of a lifetime ...Silver Wattle confirms Belinda Alexandra as one of our foremost story-tellers. Weaving fact into inspiring fiction with great flair and imagination, this is a novel as full of hope, glamour and heartbreak as the film industry itself.'An absorbing story of hope and despair, loyalty and love' - Woman's Day'Readers are kept on their toes ... and it's a worthwhile wait' - Courier-Mail
author: Belinda Alexandra
